days.name: High-Intensity Bodyweight Circuit
days.description:
Warm-Up: (6 min)
Dynamic Stretching: High knees, butt kicks, leg swings, lunge + twist, side lunge, high skips (3 minutes, 30 seconds each)
Jump Rope: Moderate pace to high speed (3 minutes)

Circuit 1: Core and Cardio Combo (22 minutes)
Exercise 1: Plank to Toe Touch – 45 seconds
Exercise 2: Bicycle Crunches – 45 seconds
Exercise 3: Jump Squats – 45 seconds
Exercise 4: Mountain Climbers – 45 seconds
Exercise 5: Burpees – 45 seconds
Rest: 1 minute and 15 second rest after each circuit; repeat 4 times
Break: 2 Minutes

Exercise 1: Rowing Machine (14 minutes)
Sets: 3 x 3 minutes moderate pace with 1-minute high intensity at end of each set
Description: Alternate steady rowing pace with high-power bursts.
Break: 2 Minutes

Circuit 2: Core Strength and Stability (14 minutes)
Exercise 1: Plank Jacks – 45 seconds
Exercise 2: Russian Twists – 45 seconds
Exercise 3: Side Plank (Left) – 45 seconds
Exercise 4: Side Plank (Right) – 45 seconds
Rest: 1 minute after completing the circuit; repeat 3 times
Break: 2 Minutes
	
Post-Workout Stretch (4 minutes)
Child’s Pose: 2 minutes, focus on deep breathing
Standing Hamstring Stretch: 1 minutes per leg

days.name: Cardio Circuit for Endurance
days.description:
Warm-Up: (6 min)
Dynamic Stretching: High knees, butt kicks, leg swings, lunge + twist, side lunge, high skips (3 minutes, 30 seconds each)
Jump Rope: Moderate pace to high speed (3 minutes)

Circuit 1: Bodyweight Cardio and Power (17 minutes)
Exercise 1: Jump Lunges – 45 seconds
Exercise 2: Burpees – 45 seconds
Exercise 3: High-Knee Runs – 45 seconds
Exercise 4: Power Push-Ups – 45 seconds
Exercise 5: Star Jumps – 45 seconds
Rest: 1 minute and 15 second rest after completing the circuit; repeat 3 times
Break: 2 Minutes

Exercise 1: Treadmill Incline Walk (13 minutes)
Sets: 12 minutes at a 10% incline
Description: Steady pace to maintain heart rate.
Break: 1 Minutes

Circuit 2: Core and Lower Body Circuit (17 minutes)
Exercise 1: Walking Lunges – 45 seconds per leg
Exercise 2: Glute Bridge March – 45 seconds
Exercise 3: Side Plank with Leg Raise – 45 seconds per side
Exercise 4: Plank to Downward Dog – 45 seconds
Rest: 30 second rest after completing the circuit; repeat 3 times
Break: 2 Minutes

Post-Workout Stretch (7 minutes)
Quad Stretch: 45 seconds per leg
Hamstring Stretch: 45 seconds per leg
Downward Dog: 2 minutes (1 minute hold, repeat 2x)
Cat-Cow Stretch: 2 minutes, alternating positions
